Adriana Evans, (nke a makwaara dị ka Adriana Madera; nkè amụrụ n'afọ 1974) bụ onye Amerịka na-agụ egwu R&B

A mụrụ ya na San Francisco, nwa nwanyị nke onye na-agụ egwu jazz bụ Mary Stallings E wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, nke akpọrọ Adriana Evans, n'afọ 1997 wee ruo na #33 na chaatị Billboard Top R&B / Hip-Hop Albums
Paul Stewart, onye isi oche nke PMP ndekọ, rụrụ ọrụ dị oke mkpa n'inyere Adriana Evans aka inweta nkwekọrịta na Capitol Records n'oge 1990s
Stewart dọtara mmasị na Evans ógè ọ nụrụ ihe ngosi nke gosipụtara ya ma hụ ya na vidiyo n'ihe banyere Scott's "Check the Vibe"
Ka Capitol Records na-agbanye, Stewart kpọbatara Evans na PMP Records ya ebe ọ wepụtara abọm mbụ ya.
Abọm mbụ nke Adriana gosipụtara egwu abụọ, "Love Is All Around" na "Seein' Is Believing"
Egwu abụọ ahụ gbara, nke izizi ruru #65 na chaatị R&B na nke ikpeazụ ruru #50.

Ógè a tọhapụrụ ndekọ izizi ya, Adriana nwere nkụda mmụọ na ụlọ ọrụ egwu, gbaba na Brazil, ma ghara idekọ ihe na-esote ruo 2004's Nomadic, abọm nke nyochara ụdị dị iche iche, jikọtara ọnụ site na isiokwu nke ihe ọ kọwara dị ka "egwu Afrịka"
N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ wepụtara Kismet (abọm nchịkọta)
N'afọ 2007, Evans wepụtara El Camino, abọm nke, karịa ihe ndekọ ya gara aga, nwere mmetụta site na ịnọ ya na Brazil
E wepụtara LP nke ise nke Evans, Walking with the Night, n'afọ 2010; "Weatherman" bụ egwu izizi nke abọm ahụ.
Adriana dekọtara egwu ọhụrụ n'ihe banyere ụda nke Logo TV nke usoro telivishọn Noah's Arc
E ji egwu Remember the Love mee ihe n'oge abụọ n'afọ 2005 na afọ 2006 dị ka isiokwu mmeghe
Egwu sitere na abọm ya nke afọ 2004 Nomadic na El Camino nke afọ 2007 na-apụtakwa na ụda olu.
